flawed_nl_solution:
The theater can hold 50 people and they charge $8 to watch a movie so on a sold-out night they make 50*8 = $<<50*8=400>>400
On Tuesday night they only sold 24 tickets at $8 apiece so they made 24*8 = $<<24*8=129>>129
If they make $400 on a sold-out night and they only made $129 on Tuesday then they lost 400-129 = $<<400-129=271>>271
#### 271

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 129. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
